Duel.com
Provably Fair System Audit
Certified by ProvablyFair.org
Issued: Feb 12, 2026
Audit ID: PF-2026-001
Next Review: Feb 2027
Status: CERTIFIED
‚úì Certified Open Source PF Audit v1.0

Independent verification of RNG integrity, live game parity, RTP convergence, and fairness integrity across 8 games. Complete methodology and findings available in the Executive Summary. In-depth audit reports for each game are accessible via the sidebar.

System Integrity Snapshot

Audit Verdict

Each control area was independently tested using live production data, Monte Carlo simulations, and adversarial integrity testing. All five checks passed with zero exceptions.

# Control Area Status Evidence Summary
01 Determinism Pass HMAC-SHA256 with rejection sampling. Nonce starts at 0, increments by 1, never reused. Player controls client seed. 100% deterministic.
02 RNG Integrity Pass No external entropy sources (drand fields null). Chi-squared uniformity: p = 0.472 across 980K simulated rounds. Rejection sampling eliminates modulo bias.
03 Live ‚Üî Verifier Parity Pass 30,742 real bets verified. 100% match rate ‚Äî zero discrepancies between live results and independently computed outcomes.
04 RTP Validation Pass Theoretical RTP verified across all game configurations. Simulated RTP converges within expected variance over 80M+ rounds.
05 Fairness Integrity Pass 15 integrity checks passed per game: nonce sequencing, seed commitment, outcome determinism, round isolation, payout integrity, replay resistance, entropy validation.
30,742
Live Bets Verified
80,000,000+
Simulation Rounds
120
Game Integrity Checks
8 / 8
